verse:
स्वर्गे न भयं किञ्चनास्ति न तत्र त्वं न जरया बिभेति।
उभे तीर्त्वाऽशनायापिपासे शोकातिगो मोदते स्वर्गलोके ॥

terms.न भयं किञ्चनास्ति: there is no fear at all
terms.न तत्र त्वं न जरया बिभेति: You (the person being addressed) will not fear age and decay there
terms.उभे तीर्त्वाऽशनायापिपासे: Having crossed over and satisfied all hunger and thirst

meaning: In heaven, there is no fear whatsoever. You will not have to fear aging or decay. Once you have crossed over and satisfied all hunger and thirst, you will experience happiness beyond grief in the world of heaven.

upanishad-org.meaning: In heaven fear is not at all, in heaven, O Death, thou art not, nor old age and its terrors; crossing over hunger and thirst as over two rivers, leaving sorrow behind the soul in heaven rejoices
